segment.source: Add or Remove a Custom Recording Profile
segment.target: Add or Remove a Custom Recording Profile

segment.source: Add or Remove a Custom Recording Profile
segment.target: Add or Remove a Custom Recording Profile

segment.source: Add or Remove a Custom Recording Profile
segment.target: Add or Remove a Custom Recording Profile

segment.source: This procedure describes how to add a custom recording profile in the Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) user interface (UI).
segment.target: This procedure describes how to add a custom recording profile in the Windows Performance Recorder (WPR) user interface (UI).

segment.source: For information about how to start a recording from the command line, see WPR Command-Line Options.
segment.target: For information about how to start a recording from the command line, see WPR Command-Line Options.

segment.source: To add a recording profile
segment.target: To add a recording profile

segment.source: On the WPR screen, if the options are hidden, click More options.
segment.target: On the WPR screen, if the options are hidden, click More options.

segment.source: Click Add Profiles.
segment.target: Click Add Profiles.

segment.source: Navigate to the location that contains the profile files, select the .wprp file, and then click Open.
segment.target: Navigate to the location that contains the profile files, select the .wprp file, and then click Open.

segment.source: WPR will validate the schema of the .wprp file before it is added to the profile.
segment.target: WPR will validate the schema of the .wprp file before it is added to the profile.

segment.source: Repeat steps 2 and 3 to add additional profiles.
segment.target: Repeat steps 2 and 3 to add additional profiles.

segment.source: You can use up to 64 profiles for a single recording.
segment.target: You can use up to 64 profiles for a single recording.

segment.source: The profiles that you added will display under Custom measurements.
segment.target: The profiles that you added will display under Custom measurements.

segment.source: To remove a recording profile
segment.target: To remove a recording profile

segment.source: On the WPR screen, if the options are hidden, click More options.
segment.target: On the WPR screen, if the options are hidden, click More options.

segment.source: Right-click the custom profile that you want to remove and then click Remove Profile.
segment.target: Right-click the custom profile that you want to remove and then click Remove Profile.

segment.source: The Remove Profile button is visible only if custom profiles are present.
segment.target: The Remove Profile button is visible only if custom profiles are present.

segment.source: You can only remove custom profiles: you cannot remove built-in profiles.
segment.target: You can only remove custom profiles: you cannot remove built-in profiles.
